sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SAMOLUS, in botany: A genus of the monogynia order, belonging to the pentandria claſs of plants; and in the natural method ranking under the 21ſt order, Preciae. The corolla is ſalver-ſhaped, the ſtamina ſurrounded by ſmall ſcales at its throat. The capſule is unilocular inferior.
